verses.verse: Now it came to pass<WH1732>, as David sat<WH3427> in his house<WH1004>, that David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030>, Behold<WH3427>, I live in an house<WH1004> of cedars<WH730>, but the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the Lord<WH3068> remains under curtains<WH3407>.
Then Nathan<WH5416> said<WH559> unto David<WH1732>, Do<WH6213> all that is in your heart<WH3824>; for God is with you<WH430>.
And it came to pass the same night<WH3915>, that the word<WH1697> of God<WH430> came to Nathan<WH5416>, saying<WH559>,
Go<WH3212> and tell<WH559> David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>, You shall not build<WH1129> me a house<WH1004> to live in<WH3427>:

For I have not lived in<WH3427> a house<WH1004> since the day<WH3117> that I brought up<WH5927> Israel<WH3478> unto this day<WH3117>; but have gone from tent<WH168> to tent<WH168>, and from one tabernacle to another<WH4908>.

Wherever I have walked<WH1980> with all Israel<WH3478>, spoke<WH1696> I a word<WH1697> to any<WH259> of the judges<WH8199> of Israel<WH3478>, whom I commanded<WH6680> to feed<WH7462> my people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>, Why have you not built<WH1129> me an house<WH1004> of cedars<WH730>?

Now therefore thus shall you say<WH559> unto my servant<WH5650> David<WH1732>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, I took<WH3947> you from the sheep fold<WH5116>, even from following<WH310> the sheep<WH6629>, that you should be ruler<WH5057> over my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>:

And I have been with you wherever you have walked<WH1980>, and have cut off<WH3772> all your enemies<WH341> from before<WH6440> you<WH6213>, and have made you a name<WH8034> like the name<WH8034> of the great men<WH1419> that are in the earth<WH776>.

Also I will ordain<WH7760> a place<WH4725> for my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>, and will plant<WH5193> them<WH7931>, and they shall live in their place<WH7264>, and shall be moved no more<WH1121>; neither shall the sons of wickedness<WH5766> waste<WH1086> them any more<WH3254>, as at the beginning<WH7223>,

And since the time<WH3117> that I commanded<WH6680> judges<WH8199> to be over my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>. Moreover I will subdue<WH3665> all your enemies<WH341>. Furthermore I tell<WH5046> you that the Lord<WH3068> will build<WH1129> you an house<WH1004>.

And it shall come to pass<WH3117>, when your days be expired<WH4390> that you must go<WH3212> to be with your fathers<WH1>, that I will raise up<WH6965> your seed<WH2233> after<WH310> you<WH1121>, which shall be of your sons; and I will establish<WH3559> his kingdom<WH4438>.
He shall build<WH1129> me a house<WH1004>, and I will establish<WH3559> his throne<WH3678> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>.
I will be his father<WH1>, and he shall be my son<WH1121>: and I will not take<WH5493> my mercy<WH2617> away<WH5493> from him<WH5493>, as I took it from him that was before you<WH6440>:
But I will settle<WH5975> him in my house<WH1004> and in my kingdom<WH4438> for ever<WH5769>: and his throne<WH3678> shall be established<WH3559> for<WH5704> evermore<WH5769>.
According to all these words<WH1697>, and according to all this vision<WH2377>, so did Nathan<WH5416> speak<WH1696> unto David<WH1732>.

And David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> came<WH935> and sat<WH3427> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>, and said<WH559>, Who am I<WH3068>, O Lord God<WH430>, and what is my house<WH1004>, that you have brought<WH935> me until now<WH1988>?

And yet this was a small thing<WH6994> in your eyes<WH5869>, O God<WH430>; for you have also spoken<WH1696> of your servant<WH5650>'s house<WH1004> for a great while to come<WH7350>, and have regarded<WH7200> me according to the estate<WH8448> of a man<WH120> of high degree<WH4609>, O Lord<WH3068> God<WH430>.
What can<WH3254> David<WH1732> speak more<WH3254> to you for the honor<WH3519> of your servant<WH5650>? for you know<WH3045> your servant<WH5650>.
O Lord<WH3068>, for your servant<WH5650>'s sake<WH3820>, and according to your own heart, have you done<WH6213> all this greatness<WH1420>, in making known<WH3045> all these great things<WH1420>.
O Lord<WH3068>, there is none like you<WH430>, neither is there any God beside<WH2108> you<WH8085>, according to all that we have heard with our ears<WH241>.

And what one<WH259> nation<WH1471> in the earth<WH776> is like your people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>, whom God<WH430> went<WH1980> to redeem<WH6299> to be his own people<WH5971>, to make<WH7760> you a name<WH8034> of greatness<WH1420> and terribleness<WH3372>, by driving out<WH1644> nations<WH1471> from before<WH6440> your people<WH5971>, whom you have redeemed<WH6299> out of Egypt<WH4714>?
For your people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> did you make<WH5414> your own people<WH5971> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>; and you<WH3068>, Lord, became their God<WH430>.

Therefore now<WH3068>, Lord, let the thing<WH1697> that you have spoken<WH1696> concerning your servant<WH5650> and concerning his house<WH1004> be established<WH539> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, and do<WH6213> as you have said<WH1696>.

Let it even be established<WH539>, that your name<WH8034> may be magnified<WH1431> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, saying<WH559>, The Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, even a God<WH430> to Israel<WH3478>: and let the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> your servant<WH5650> be established<WH3559> before you<WH6440>.

For you<WH430>, O my God, have told<WH1540> your servant<WH5650> that you will build<WH1129> him a house<WH1004>: therefore your servant<WH5650> has found<WH4672> in his heart to pray<WH6419> before you<WH6440>.
And now<WH3068>, Lord, you are God<WH430>, and have promised<WH1696> this goodness<WH2896> unto your servant<WH5650>:

Now therefore let it please<WH2974> you to bless<WH1288> the house<WH1004> of your servant<WH5650>, that it may be before<WH6440> you for ever<WH5769>: for you bless<WH1288>, O Lord<WH3068>, and it shall be blessed<WH1288> for ever<WH5769>.
